Upcoming Tecmo Games!
Monster Rancher Metropolis: The Cafe: Archived Topics From Prior Years: Year 2008 Topics: (Year We Visited the Town): Upcoming Tecmo Games!
By Lisa Shock on Monday, September 22, 2008 - 06:57 pm:

Here's some of the games coming this Fall from Tecmo:

SPRay
Robocalypse
Rygar: The Battle of Argus
Tecmo Bowl DS

You can find reviews for all of these games at your favorite game review sites, looks like it's good news for Wii and DS owners!
